availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hudson was a farmer in Wayne County who married Jane Jones on November 25, 1810. According to the 1830 census, he owned 13 slaves.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “William Hudson (September 16, 1786-February 28, 1839),” Memorial #67196096, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=67196096 (accessed June 3, 2017); Fifth Manuscript Census of the United States_ (1830), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Wayne, unstated, p. 42; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000591550, Wayne County Marriages, p. 310.
